column1: Common pattern; nucleus has nested relations.
Common pattern; nucleus without nested relations.
Nucleus and satellite's nucleus have the same subject.
Nucleus is surrounded by quotation marks and satellite's satellite contains a speech verb.
Nucleus starts with 'if' and its left subrelation is not 'Condition'.
Satellite's nucleus contains 'in fact' / 'as a matter of fact' / 'actually' / 'indeed' / 'also'.
